aboutUsPage.title: Declic - Social Outings and Event Organization
aboutUsPage.description1: Social network for outings, meetings, and events, fostering authentic connections and shared activities in the real world.
aboutUsPage.description2: Connect with people who share the same interests as you! Outings and events are categorized based on interests. The Declic app will recommend events that match your interests and past outings.
aboutUsPage.description3: Take the initiative and dive into event organization! Whether you want to try a new restaurant, start a new sport, or attend a festival with no one in your circle interested, Declic App gives you the chance to plan outings and connect with like-minded individuals.
aboutUsPage.description4: Stay in touch and communicate with your friends! Declic allows you to follow other users and engage in discussions via chat.
aboutUsPage.description5: Express yourself and attract new friendships! Each user can add a description to their profile, upload photos, and share their interests to introduce themselves to the community and attract people who want to get to know them in real life.
aboutUsPage.title2: Ready to laugh and make new connections?
aboutUsPage.description6: Whether you've just moved and need new friends, are unsuccessful in finding love on dating sites, or maybe you're a professional looking to highlight your event, guess what? You've landed in the right place!
aboutUsPage.description7: Here's the Déclic app, the ultimate catalyst for new connections and friendly outings and gatherings. With the Déclic app, you have the power to plan your own events, gatherings, and meetings, or to discover and join pre-organized events.
aboutUsPage.description8: Our app offers the possibility to connect with new people and cultivate authentic relationships in the physical world, as well as to share and engage in activities aligned with your interests.
aboutUsPage.description9: This initial version of our app is multilingual and supports English, French, and Arabic. Be the brains behind new adventures or join other users for a fantastic time.
aboutUsPage.description10: The Déclic team sends vibes for an amazing and fun-filled experience! May you catch this 'Déclic' for exciting new activities and great connections!

footer.description: Discover Declic, your social platform dedicated to organizing friendly activities, meetings, and events. Connect with other members, explore new experiences, and stay informed through our newsletter. Join us today to create memorable moments and build authentic connections.

home.declicDescription: Social network for outings, meetings, and events, promoting authentic connections in the real world. Declic recommends events based on your interests, allows you to plan outings, and stay in touch with your friends.
home.welcome-description: Start your journey by signing up or logging in.
home.mobile-app-description: You can also use our application on your smartphone.
home.network-heading: Declic - Friendly Outings and Event Organization
home.network-description: Social network for outings, meetings, and events, promoting authentic connections and shared activities in the real world.
home.nyt-quote: For women who travel or have moved to a new city, a similar social circle is now quickly accessible.

bottomSection.card1Title: Meet people who share your interests and location
bottomSection.card1Description: Connect with individuals who share your passions. Declic recommends events based on your common interests and favorite activities.
bottomSection.card2Title: Organize your own outings and events
bottomSection.card2Description: Plan your outings and events. Declic gives you the opportunity to connect with people who share your interests.
bottomSection.card3Title: Stay in touch and communicate with your friends
bottomSection.card3Description: Stay connected and engage in discussions. Declic allows you to follow other users and participate in conversations.
bottomSection.declicHeading: Declic - Social Outings and Event Organization
bottomSection.declicSubheading: Social network for outings, meetings, and events, fostering authentic connections and shared activities in the real world.

discoverEventsAndGroups.title: Discover Events and Groups
discoverEventsAndGroups.text: See who is organizing events that match your interests near you

createEvent.title: Create an Event to Organize Meetings
createEvent.text: Create your own Declic event and gather people with similar interests

joinDeclic2.title: Join Declic
joinDeclic2.description: Sign up to join our community and start exploring exciting events.

changeLives.title: The People We Meet Change Our Lives
changeLives.text1: Whether it's taking you on a new adventure, finding your place in a new city, connecting you with your next job, introducing you to the love of your life, or discussing a tough time, we all get by with a little help from our friends.
changeLives.text2: Declic empowers people to choose community over competition and harnesses the power of a global community like yours.

takeFirstStep.title: Take the First Step Towards Adventure
takeFirstStep.text: Explore new horizons near you! If you already have an account, log in to explore all available events and join the Declic community.

Welcome_Back.subheader: To keep connected with us please login with your personal info

Register.Enter_your_personal_details: Enter your personal details and start journey with us
Register.title: Sign Up
Register.Name: Name

no-events-found.title: You don't have any events
no-events-found.description: No events found at the moment. Why not create your own event and invite your friends?

no-joined-events.title: You haven't joined any events yet.
no-joined-events.description1: Discover unique experiences by joining our exciting events! Connect with fellow enthusiasts and share unforgettable moments.
no-joined-events.description2: Browse our selection of events and join the community today!

no-upcoming-activities.title: No upcoming activities at the moment, but stay tuned!
no-upcoming-activities.description1: It seems we don't have any upcoming activities right now, but don't worry, exciting new adventures are in the works.
no-upcoming-activities.description2: Check back soon to discover our upcoming events and spice up your schedule!

first-time.profile-type-info: Public profiles are visible to everyone. Private profiles hide your interests and photos from others.
first-time.bio-info: Your bio must be at least 15 characters long.
first-time.birth-date-info: You must be at least 15 years old.
first-time.city-info: Your city will be used to recommend events to you.
first-time.interests-info: Choose at least 2 interests. This will be used to recommend events to you.
first-time.additional-images-info: You must select between 2 and 5 images.
first-time.image-number-error1: The number of images must be between

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.introText: We look forward to hearing from you. Our team is happy to answer all your questions and provide you with the information you need. Contact us today to discover all the benefits of working with us!
contactUs.phoneInfo: Need immediate assistance? Call us at
contactUs.emailInfo: For any email inquiries, send a message to
contactUs.addressInfo: Find us at the following address:
contactUs.messageSent: Your message has been sent successfully! We will get back to you soon.
contactUs.sendError: An error occurred while sending the message. Please try again later.
